metadata.title: CVE-2021-46909 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ARM:footbridge: fix PCI interrupt mapping Since commit 30fdfb929e82 ("PCI: Adda call to pci_assign_irq() in pci_device_probe()"), the PCI code will callthe IRQ mapping function whenever a PCI driver is probed. If these aremarked as __init, this causes an oops if a PCI driver is loaded or boundafter the kernel has initialised.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
